class_notes: Reading of selected books in Greek, others in translation. Odysseus figures also in Iliad, Aeneid, Divine Comedy; we will reflect these representations. Two hour exams, short papers, final exam or paper.
course_description: Topics will vary; the course may be repeated for credit as topic varies.
